headline: Hardware Firewall Market Outlook (2026-2031) Featuring Profiles of Fortinet, Palo Alto Networks, Cisco Systems, Check Point Software Technologies, Juniper Networks and More
summary: Managed services outpace hardware demand as firms opt for outcome-based contracts.
